name: jenkins-build-light
description: webapp that displays the status of several jenkins jobs even across multiple servers

scripts.start: npm run start:proxy && npm run start:server
scripts.stop: npm run stop:server; npm run stop:proxy
scripts.stop:proxy: kill `ps | grep node.*bin/proxy | grep -v grep | cut -f 1 -d ' '` 2> /dev/null && echo proxy stopped || echo proxy already stopped
scripts.stop:server: kill `ps | grep jenkins-build-light.*webpack | grep -v grep | cut -f 1 -d ' '` 2> /dev/null && echo server stopped || echo server already stopped

author: Mike Holm <coldpour@gmail.com>
